title: anbE AruyirE
sahitya:
anbE aruyirE en azhagu maNALA nin Anandam en sholvEn


anupallavi

  unparam enru nidam Uriya pEdaiyai uLLattil vandu nI meLLak-kalandanai


caraNam    kaLLamillAk-kAdal veLLam anri oru kAsu paNam ariyEn oLi vIsi ennuL niraindAi
veLLam pOl vandenedu vETkaiyait-tIrttanai vEdA en prANanAthA sharN sharaN
